website_summaries.verdict: There are better, brighter smart bulbs for the same price, and plenty of Bluetooth speaker bulbs that cost less. Keep shopping.
pros: Sengled's newest speaker bulb puts out clean, crisp sound, albeit with very little oomph
It's also easy to use -- just screw it in, turn it on and pair it with your phone like any other Bluetooth device
cons: The app's lighting controls are extremely basic, and the bulb doesn't work with any larger smart home platforms or voice assistants
The bulb's default setting is only about as bright as an average accent light, and none of the colors are much brighter than a nightlight

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Could use for party or pure relax at home
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product. It is easy to install. Literally "Plug and play". The speaker could be use by it own or with the changing lights. It is loud enough. Additionally, it is fantastic that light color changes with music. Can not wait to hosting a party and playing it with friend.
customer_reviews.author: skandy

customer_reviews.title: The lightbulb is really easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The lightbulb is really easy to set up, only took a couple minutes to screw it in, download the app connect it to my device via Bluetooth and start playing music and changing the colors. The sound from the bulb is good and it can loud if you turn the volume up. The brightness of the bulb is also good, changing colors aside, it can get really bright and it’s easy to adjust using the app. Overall I’m really happy with this new light bulb and have been enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sengled Solo Bluetooth dimmable bulb for my daughter for her birthday. She loves it. We think it’s one of the best inventions since the wheel was invented! It’s good sound for the bathroom and it’s just as bright as our regular bulbs, just perfect. Of course, only one device at a time can play music with it and that’s fine. I’m already purchasing a few more to go around the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: DShopper

customer_reviews.title: Super easy. Sounds great!! We love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install - unpack - take out light bulb from canned light put Spengled smart bulb in - partner with Bluetooth on your device - upload app to control brightness and boom your on!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Edington

customer_reviews.title: innovation of LED light
customer_reviews.text: If you ask me to give an one word review of this product, Innovation is all I can say. I had never thought an LED light bulb can be so fancy, with all the cool functions controlled by phone. You can change the color, and pick different moods, my daughter likes the rainbow mode particularly. And .. you get a speaker on it! The sound is not like a super expensive speaker, but I was impressed by it. If there is an improvement needed, I would say, add a timer function to the app? so it can turn itself on at say 10pm and shut itself off at 7am for a night light. Overall, it's beyond my expectation, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Easy to set up. Kids LOVE it! We danced for almost a hour after putting this on. It makes the room feel like a mini disco dancing place :)
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I can control the light and music at the same time. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Peng C.

customer_reviews.title: FOREIGN TRADE
customer_reviews.text: After several hours of following directions and scanning the product's Q Code, the bulb failed to configure as described. Not being a novice in the set up of WIFI smart devices that would be controlled through the Alexa App., this "Smart Bulb" proved totally frustrating. I think products such as these $26.00 bulbs must have a part to play in our one sided world trade agreements made under previous administrations in the last 40 yrs. In all fairness, the bulb does work as a light and returning is a hassle so will keep. Have fun with the set up if you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Specially Lit Up Here
customer_reviews.text: I thought for sure by the JBL name that this would be an amazing light/speaker combo- but it isn’t. I was so excited when it came only to be let down. It’s dim and the speaker is definitely nothing special for the size and weight of it. I have purchased others that are rgb and white light that are almost as good for more than half the price. The good... app controlled, easy to connect to, and feels very sturdy compared to others The bad... kinda dim, poor sound although a Little louder than some others, not rgb- and fluorescent white color, very heavy, expensive for what your getting.
customer_reviews.author: Benjie B

customer_reviews.title: It sounds great, and it isn't that bright
customer_reviews.text: Wish the color could be controlled by Alexa, if it can I haven't been able to figure it out. It sounds great, and it isn't that bright, which is okay as I got it to keep on in blue as a bathroom nightlight and so I can listen to podcasts or news in the shower as I get ready in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID J. YOUNG

customer_reviews.title: Only if no other option works for your budget.
customer_reviews.text: Overall not worth having. Tested in multiple lamps and sound quality varied from poor to barely acceptable. The good: Great colors, easy to use app. The bad: speaker quality is below average. Better to use your phone. It is louder than most phones but the sacrifice in audio quality is more than I would like. It isn't worth it for me. The rythm mode seems random vs rhythm following. It is a very loose definition of rhythm. It also only follows rhythm played through it, unlike other LED products that can follow ambient music. Brightness is ok, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: JAWS78

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gimmick for my kids - they love it. Easy to set up and works both ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gimmick for my kids - they love it. Easy to set up and works both as a bulb and a speaker. Sound quality is fine for the price range. The volume is a little on the low side, but for something so inexpensive (and that's primarily a light bulb) you can't really complain
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Samsung S10 don't waste yourtime
customer_reviews.text: The app does not work with Samsung S10. I called Singled and they told me they knew of the issue but had no time frame of a fix or even a clue if anyone in China was even currently working on the issue. I can play music with it but as for the light, color change, dimming, volume control, or any other feature forget it. Due to my work schedule I can't even send it back and I waited 19 days to get it. Lesson learned I'm stuck with a 45$ bluetooth speaker that isn't even portable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel 1

customer_reviews.title: difficult/unable to setup
customer_reviews.text: I spent about 2 hours trying to download the various apps and messing with Alexa to try to sync up with Alexa but it was just not happening so I finally just gave up. Also, I would not recommend using this in a bathroom to listen to the radio whilst showering because it can't seem to keep a connection when there's steam. Guess it's an ok LED bulb but the noise it makes when it turns on is annoying; I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ramenbum

customer_reviews.title: No product support for Prime Members
customer_reviews.text: Only one bulb can be paired with a phone at a time. I bought two bulbs and was sorely disappointed that I had to choose which bulb I wanted to be connected with Bluetooth instead of both bulbs simultaneously. Amazon product support was no help. It demanded that I enter 10 digits of my phone number while passive aggressively not allowing me to do so. I'm sending it back - no product support.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: sengled jbl bluetooth smart bulb better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of a bluetooth electric bulb. It installed and paired up with my android phone flawlessly. Due to the small size of the 1" speaker pair on the bulb I didn't expect much fidelity though I respect JBL audio"s reputation. I was surprised at the quality of the sound which can be controlled by your phone's audio increase buttons. I have it by my bedside for a sleep aid and it is terrific. No more trying to go to sleep with earbuds. In addition to the audio you have rheostatic control over the bulbs brightness from sengled app on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: chrisbmartin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a gimmick I can't believe that they would actually make a JBL speaker with a LED bulb or out of a LED bulb but once I installed it connected my phone to it I was like wait this is something that I could use one thing I need to find out though is if I connect multiple ones if they can all be connected to the same device I would be amazing I love this idea of a light with a speaker and I would recommend this as was by more to give out for Christmas this year!
customer_reviews.author: Luis E.

customer_reviews.title: super compact and super sound
customer_reviews.text: great common sense product. I like an uncluttered bathroom. so to have a portable bluetooth speaker or shower radio didn't work for me. it was simple to setup as long as you follow the specific steps outlined in instructions. sound is awesome for a small compact light bulb. my bathroom is compact so the sound is acceptable and bass is fair. I only gave it 5 stars because I find the necessity to use their app and bluetooth connection to be redundant. the app doesn't do much at all except dim brightness(although this was helpful to match the other 3 lightbulbs in my fixture). Price is so reasonable for the quality and I would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bulb horrible malware app
customer_reviews.text: The light is nice and bright and was way to install and connect to my phone via Bluetooth. The biggest issue is that the app you need to install to user the other features asks for way to many permissions. Why does it need access to my camera, contacts, activity on my phone ?? Sounds like malware trying to hide behind a smart bulb. I'm thinking of sending it back due to that but seeing as it's only connected via Bluetooth and not my wireless network I may keep it.
customer_reviews.author: gohan2021

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T PAIR WITH ALEXA!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to pair with my Alexa but apparently I needed to purchase 2 apps and a hub! It doesn’t even turn on when my internet goes out and it’s not letting me pair with Alexa. I regret this purchase and I suggest you buy amazon echo bulb if your planning on pairing it. The brightness sucks when it comes to its different colors. It doesn’t even light the small room it’s in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Schalesky

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and handy app!
customer_reviews.text: Actually a really handy product. Tested it out with rock music and the sound won't blow your ears back but it's great for music while working around the house. Sounds great when I tested it out listening to NPR shows. The mode that changes color to the beat of the music worked better than expected. Paired with my phone right out of the box and the app is easy to download and use. Energy saver mode is great for watching tv. Only cons I've found is that it could be a bit brighter but it gets the job done well. Going to pick up a couple more for other rooms in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Yakaites

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Simple set up! Decent Sound...(it is not a Bose or a Sonos) lacking in bass. But it is plenty good enough for the price point and multi functionality of the whole thing. Easy to use App. Love the memory function so that I don't have to reset the light/sound every time I turn it on....just comes on as I last used it. I use it with my phone/Pandora/Bose Mini II - gives me whole house sound at a fraction of the cost with a light to boot!! Good Deal!
customer_reviews.author: RHom

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth bulb/speaker works really well. I currently use it in my bathroom and it is paired with an iPad. The sound that comes out of it is really good. One thing I did not like was that the bulb dimming settings do not save in the app. Minor annoyance but otherwise I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound plus its a light bulb!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bluetooth speaker, unique in that installs also as a light bulb and gives off decent light besides. Super easy to install, sync with your device and get playing. The sound is OUTSTANDING!! I love this speaker and hope it keeps on playing forever and ever and ever, amen! My daughter had one installed in her kitchen area and when I experienced it, I immediately ordered up one to install in my home! SO MUCH FUN!!
customer_reviews.author: judeb

customer_reviews.title: This review is for the solo RGB
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've been a fan of sengled products for some time, I do own the sengled pulse solo, which is the 1st gen product of the RGB solo. While most of the features remained the same, there are differences. I do enjoy the light effects, but the app is noticeably low res, and no real customization available, which I understand that to keep the cost down this product is not feature-rich. The sound quality is good, not as loud as the pulse solo, and no stereo quality audio. It would be awesome if this could be connected to another RGB solo bulb to get the stereo sound, but its good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is really cool. The size of it pretty much mimics a standard bulb. The surface area of the lighted section is much more than other, similar bulbs on the market. The colors are beautiful and the sound is really good. I have it on my balcony and I'm looking forward to playing some tunes under the glow of the million colors to choose from. The app is super easy to use and installing it was a breeze. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J. Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Fun confusing my kids.
customer_reviews.text: I put this bulb in a lamp in my bedroom, then confused my kids as to where the music was coming from. It was very easy to setup and connect to the phone. If you download the app you can turn the light on and off and even dim it's brightness. It's not necessary if you just want to play music and you can adjust the volume on your phone. The sound is quite good, it is now my go to when listening to music in the bedroom. I also like being able to dim the brightness, especially when others are asleep and I just need a little bit of light to get dressed.
customer_reviews.author: kred4d

customer_reviews.title: Totally unnecessary purchase I absolutely LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We placed this bulb in the exterior light fixture on our patio and really love it. It's perfect for our need for having a little music while we're grilling, eating dinner or sitting on the patio. It connected so easily to my phone I didn't even realize it had connected...I was thinking it was all much more complicated than it was. It has more colors than you could possibly need and the dim to bright ratio is a wide range. It's perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kat L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound Pretty Light
customer_reviews.text: I've been sold on the idea of the Sengled Sound lights, but all the different types aren't compatible within one system. The Link needs Satellite bulbs-up to 8 of them, but won't work with Master Bulbs, Solo (decent sound quality, needs subwoofer, but won't pair with a Link) or Pulse Color Plus (tingy-poor sound quality, but pretty light options). It's very confusing even for the Pulse App. It has a very difficult time establishing connection to whichever light might be turned on. Phone drops connection if any other Pulse Lights turn on. The QR Codes are super tiny on the bulbs, phone returns error messages, before connecting. Novelty items.
customer_reviews.author: MarcyIR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, I have prime therefore I received it the very next day. Actually on a Sunday, extremely easy to use, I put in my lamp just like a normal light bulb and it turned on when I hit the light switch. Connected on the first try to my Bluetooth on my phone and I immediately began listening to music. I knew this would be a good product before I received. So I purchased 3 at the same time. It is very strong solid and durable, not a flimsy piece of crap like others. Great great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. Perfect connection with any bluetooth devices, I put it on the shower, and connected to Alexa, So while I in the shower just control whatever I want to listen with voice control. You can also dime the light with the Sengledpulse app. Excelente Producto, fácil conexión con cualquier dispositivo con bluetooth, y versatil al sincronizarlo con Alexa. Puede controlar la luz y el volumen desde la app de Sengledpulse.
customer_reviews.author: DIEGO

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb, I couldn't get the app to work
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bulb. I do not have a master-slave system, but it was a great way for anyone to control the music. The sound quality or loudness is probably lower than the new 16-inch macbook, but I don't think that is what it is for. I could connect to the bulb with bluetooth and play songs, but I could never get the app to work, so that is something to care about.
customer_reviews.author: Mimansa Jaiswal

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G.! This light is so awesome! I wish everyone could have this. The only reason I don’t give it 5 stars is that you can’t totally control it with Alexa or Siri but overall a quality product and great conversation piece
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Neat Product
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install and set up. The sound from this bulb is really amazing - who would think such sound would emanate from a bulb. Bulb does extend a little beyond the light shroud. Expect that is for better sound dissemination. Bulb is more of a spot than an area light but it does provide more than adequate light. Tends to be a bit pricey but worth it if you want decent music piped into a specific location like the master bath. Definitely would buy again and probably will buy another for a separate location.
customer_reviews.author: Oarsman50

customer_reviews.title: Way better that I expected
customer_reviews.text: We were truly surprised with the quality of the music from the built-in speakers. The bass could be better but then again, it is an amazing buy for the price point. The sound quality was better than a number of the bluetooth speakers at our home. Definitely worth the buy if you don't want additional speakers sitting on your tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: HoomanDad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bulb
customer_reviews.text: The bulb is good and very well packaged. Its easy to install but make sure your holders are screw type not pin. The colors are okay. It connect to devices via Bluetooth which is a + since i can paly music from YouTube while still moving around the house. Its loud enough for a bulb speaker and sound quality is good. Sometimes the app connection is slow and i have to disconnect the Bluetooth which can be annoying but rarely do i use it since my core functionality is normal light and the sound. I'd say its a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Easy and inexpensive way to add some sound
customer_reviews.text: We used to have Genii Audiobulbs, but the base ended up getting lost and the connector was almost immediately obsolete anyway. We got one of these to replace it and broadcast louder and better sound from our phones without adding the clutter of a portable speaker. It's been perfect for that. The light is a much better match for other sources as well; behind a lamp shade, or inside a recessed fixture, you're unlikely to even notice it. It's not going to overpower a crowded party, but for listening to podcasts while knocking out chores, or playing some tunes for family game night, it's a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nolte

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.... buy it NOW!
customer_reviews.text: This is freaking awesome! I love the sengled brand, they make budget bulbs that work amazingly without a hiccup... I use them at my house as well as my moms and they’ve been great! The sound on this thing is crazy good and perfect for a bathroom! Wether it be a long poo sesh or shower time karaoke this thing slaps!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Steven

customer_reviews.title: great reading light and speaker for a cozy reading nook
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this Bluetooth light in her reading nook in our master bedroom. She loves the fact that she can stream music via Bluetooth to the inbuilt speaker. Its really great because the music is well directed towards her nook and doesn't disturb the rest of the bedroom too much. She loves the fact that she can control it using the app. Overall very happy with the quality and function on the sengled bluetooth bulb
customer_reviews.author: Ksunkool

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb, great speakers
customer_reviews.text: My porch light fixture doesn't take the larger floodlight sized bulbs, and this was the only A19 (regular) sized bulb speaker I can find. Pairing is easy, the light is bright (and dimmable), and most importantly of all, the speakers sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Bukkene Bruse

customer_reviews.title: A great product at a descent cost
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good and speaker quality is good for an average room. The installation might take a while via pulse app, but once installed it works seamlessly. My android phone gets and connects the Bluetooth speaker quickly and it transfers the music to it automatically. In the past two days of using the product, pretty happy with it. If you want a speaker with a very loud sound, I will not recommend it. It's a pretty good daily use speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Alok

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: sounds is good. The only annoying thing is that you can't control the light with Alexa so you have to turn off the light with Sengled app, then disconnect from that app, reconnect with alexa and then control music. Alexa controls my other lights so im not sure why this light/speaker is different.
customer_reviews.author: Vipmelis

customer_reviews.title: Single bulbs only - no stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Colors aren't very bright. White is equivalent to a standard 60w incandescent bulb. I only wish they could connect and play music in stereo. But as the name Solo implies, they are single bulbs only. If you connect to both the app will like you switch between them though.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan T.

customer_reviews.title: This little bulb sounds AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Price is right, sounds Amazing. I repurposed some skanky old lamp my wife's grandma made. I mean... it's ugly and I've always wanted to ditch it was "knew better" if you know what I mean. But now that skanky old lamp rocks like a million bucks. Buy this bulb. You'll love it. BTW - you do still need some sort of blue tooth device to connect to it. Amazon Alexa works great but so would any blue tooth device.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The speaker itself is ok. With a name like JBL, I expectesd better sound quality. It's not as loud as I expected it to be. Also, I boight the speaker rhinking I would be able to change the bulb's color, but since I can't get into the settings, I can't know for sure if its even possible. Now, the app used to operate it crashes everytime I go into settings. It seems many people that downloaded the app (from Google app store) has experienced the same bs. Im just confused as to how you can sell a product, then the software malfunctions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Speaker bulb
customer_reviews.text: This light was so easy to setup. Product works great and I'm very happy with it. M<y eight year old girl puts music on it when her friends comes for play-date and they dance with colorful lights. Its so much fun fir them and her friends says that wow its so cool.
customer_reviews.author: InstaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Had to go back...
customer_reviews.text: Size prohibits this from going into the table lamp I wanted it for. The unit is also heavy - I was surprised at how heavy. Still I tried though. Turned it on and it was static off and on so back it went. I won't try this one again and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Sound not so impressive
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this. 2 things. First it’s kind of long. Sticks out of ceiling cans quite a bit. Second is the sound quality. It’s not that great. I’m not an audiophile, but this thing has literally zero bass. My friends new iPhone has more. I own a jbl flip 3 and I thought that as it was ”jbl” it would have better sound. It’s most likely going back.
customer_reviews.author: ScriffyNerfHerder

customer_reviews.title: Hollow Sound
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item, after arriving too late to be given as a gift. I attempted to use this item myself and was not impressed with the sound quality. For a JBL Speaker I expected a more full bodied sound but instead it was very hollow with almost zero bass to it. Additionally this does not work with the Sengled Home app so you need a separate app to control the light. If you have other Sengled bulbs you will have to turn the lights on with each app and will be unable to set "rooms" to turn on together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It only works with the bluetooth phone that the app is on. Also, the sound is not that good. Last but not least the app is terrible it takes forever to connect to the bulb and leaves much to be desired. I would not recommend this product. It would have been great if it could connect to smartthings and the app worked right. There are other bulbs out there that are better and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept however if you are looking for high quality sound than don't hit order. It sounds very mono tone but you cant expect a lot from a small light speaker. I have it in a small bathroom and it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: shek

customer_reviews.title: Its loud and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this is only $27 but its worth every dollar. I have this in the middle of a 40' x 30' garage and at it's max volume it is loud enough that you can hear it well anywhere in the garage. The sound is great for what it is. Its not going to be a beats pill, but It's perfect for someone who isn't a pretentious crybaby about their "audio".
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Interesting party bulb
customer_reviews.text: Speaker isn't super loud but it worked well in my bathroom for party showers. Bluetooth connected with minimal issue but I'm still working on the sengled smart control. Will drop a star if the smart bulb part doesn't play nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, Great sound for a little light bulb
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the sound quality I would get from a little light bulb. I was pleasantly surprised once I tried them out . I got them for my bathrooms and it turns taking a shower into a full blow concert . I love them !!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Finkletits

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is awesome. My husband purchased it and installed. I thought it was a waste of money initially, just something we didn’t really need. Honestly my showers are awesome now that the music sounds like it’s in there with me. It’s a nice little splurge.
customer_reviews.author: A. G

customer_reviews.title: Do not work remotely in other locations
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I'm able to use my cell phone to hear the music outside of Alexa I don't like that Alexa do not connect to the JBL speaker and simultaneously play at the same time her own device I also don't like that JBL light and stereo device don't work if I am at another location other than inside my home it does not work like an Alexa smart light bulb
customer_reviews.author: Shina

customer_reviews.title: Louder than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This lightbulb is amazing!! It's louder than I thought it would be without any distortion even at the loudest setting. I bought it for my back porch in hopes of making it a hangout spot with everything going on. It's super bright in the regular white light setting but the best part, of course, is the rhythm setting where the colors change according to the beat of the song. Honestly, the best spontaneous purchase ever. I'd like to thank tik tok for the idea. It's really easy to set up and fit great in my enclosed back porch lamp. 10/10 would recommend. Might consider buying this for a vanity next!
customer_reviews.author: Kailyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't be swayed by JBL!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bulb because it has an JBL speaker inside. I thought the sound quality should have better. Much cheaper lights with color options had better sound.
customer_reviews.author: FanTom

customer_reviews.title: Update to control with WiFi also partner with Google and Alexa to have assistant installed as well
customer_reviews.text: Very cool if you have light socket in your shower, it has good sound, good bass(just won't get very loud.) (But loud enough) Good rythm lighting (just not very bright)(but bright enough) Overall great product. Hopefully you update it where you can control with WiFi
customer_reviews.author: Leon Bolton

customer_reviews.title: The control is great, syncs instantly
customer_reviews.text: The control is great, syncs instantly, but the sound quality is just so so. You really can't expect much from a single speaker. I have it under a covered patio, and it's super nice having music! Would be cool to have this size bulb in a pair like the Sengled Pulse.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, is bright enough.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was, it was a little long. Recessed light can fortunately had wing nuts that let you accommodate the extra 1.5" as compared to a standard light bulb. It's got decent sound, on par with small bluetooth portable speakers. Pairs fast, and with at least two devices.
customer_reviews.author: T. Amazonista

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: For a speaker light bulb it sure is loud. You can't go wrong with JBL. The only downside is that the bulb is 45 watts, not enough light for my poor vision. I wish the light bulb was 60 to 100 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Marisela Velez

customer_reviews.title: Finally fixed
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a horrible review of this product due it not being kept up to date and all the features that make this bulb worth buying being broken. As of May 11th of 2020 I have tested it again and it has been fixed thank you sengled for taking care of your customer base. I wish it wouldn't have taken this long but it's good to know that you didn't forget about us.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Installs very easy, just screw in the bulb. Connects easily via Bluetooth to your device, good sound from a small device. We use this outside on our lower deck while sitting in our hot tub. Would like an option to turn off the light while the speaker still works.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: It had to have remote control so you can listen to the music 🎶 when you sleep with out light.
customer_reviews.text: This light bold is a regular light bold socks because it has no light control switche so you can listen to the music along with out light and doesn't hold clarity for to long, I buy it because the name jbl and I'm sorry it's socks I don't recommend to anyone, (my phone is more loud and clear....... if I need light I just buy a regular light bold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: A good light that is more appropriate as a downlight since it shines downward. The speaker is sufficient for use for background dinner music. Well made and looks sturdy. I would recommend it since the price for it is good value. My only complain is the bluetooth connection drops if your music playing device is more than 10 meters away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Tangorick

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to use. Simply screwed into the socket, paired via Bluetooth to my phone, downloaded the app, and now I can play music over a pretty good speaker while adjusting the volume from my phone and turn the light on and off from my phone. It also has a light dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Hope it helps

customer_reviews.title: Android app is out of date. Does not work on updated phones.
customer_reviews.text: As a speaker- it sounded pretty good. Not quite as good once the glass dome was around the bulb- but that's expected. However, what isn't expected is that the app, as I was installing it, warned me that it was made for an older version of Android. Sure enough- it doesn't work. Unable to detect the bulb (from the same device that is streaming music to it) So that's that- and it's going back. :(
customer_reviews.author: J. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great sound. No brightness adjustments on colors
customer_reviews.text: Very fun. Good sound quality. My only con is that you can't adjust the brightness in the color modes... only the soft white color can adjust brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Yioos Surplus

customer_reviews.title: That’s it for this brand.
customer_reviews.text: All of a sudden all my Sengled bulbs don’t work. All at the same time. Alexa says it’s not connected. I have to do it manually. It was good for some time. Not buying again. Getting a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Light didn't work straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed to see my sister try and open this as part of a Christmas gift I got her, only for it to not work straight out of the box. I would just get something else entirely if I didn't get it to go with another part of her gift. I ordered a replacement, guess we'll see if that one works. I get that getting defective items can happen, will update review if we end up getting one that works, although the sour taste the first one left will most likely remain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Speaker anywhere you can put a lightbulb
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing in the bathroom it’s a lightbulb with an adjustable light temp as well as the music it’s not too overwhelming loud but perfect for a small room maybe even a porch as well it’s great gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: SSJ Govea

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with Alexa will not connect to speaker but it sounds awesome and the light is very nice in the description it says it is compatible with Alexa but it will not hook up would have gave it a 5 star if it would have hooked up to Alexa
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 2 months ago for my bathroom ceiling and I love it and I am ready to order for my kitchen because my wife want one so while she cooking she can listen the music like she use in our master bath and control the light and sound,great product for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Daya singh

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my bulb
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good and what you would expect from lightbulb sized speaker and maybe a little bit more. Just dont be expecting have super duper surround quality, that would just be silly. I use this in my kids room and works as great nightlight since he doesn't like to sleep in the dark. Connects easily with bluetooth on my phone. The app for the bulb is easy to use and a must if you want to control the light functions.
customer_reviews.author: MYkent

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb, bad app.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. I like the color adjustment. But manufacturer has not updated app, so if you have a newer phone it's just a bulb with speaker. I had a samsung S5 that app worked with.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: great sound quality. Surprising from a light bulb. My only complaint is that it is slightly longer than standard sized bulbs so my originally plan to put this above my kitchen table didn't succeed. I've had this in the bathroom for a couple of months and it seems to handle the humidity from the shower and such very well.
customer_reviews.author: dwcfastrice

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good speaker, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Despite its size, the speaker actually sounds pretty decent. It's not a Bose home theater system, but it gets the job done for some patio music. The light isn't the brightest though, so just have other sources of light available.
customer_reviews.author: Dard001

customer_reviews.title: Good for music in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the speaker in my bathroom. I use it when I’m taking a shower. The only bad thing it doesn’t works if someone calls you can’t hear the person through the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Migg

customer_reviews.title: The Pulse of Lighting
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best light bulb for the house! Not only does it conserve energy but the streaming of music is amazing. The music is clear and can be loud enough for the next room! Plus it's a great way to show off to guests!!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times, and it stopped working...after the return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: T. RYAN

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Out
customer_reviews.text: I have this installed in an overhead light and it cuts in and out. It doesn't seem matter how close the transmitting device is, after about 20 minutes it starts to cut in and out. (My other speaker bulb, different brand, does not cut out.)
customer_reviews.author: Ellis M.

customer_reviews.title: Not loud or bright
customer_reviews.text: Honestly kind of a let down. I bought one before this to give to my gf and it was the same brightness and much much louder. Plus it was only $17 compared to $50
customer_reviews.author: David Tarbox

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to install.
customer_reviews.text: Use for light and speaker in my small living room. It's easy to install. Sound come over well in small space. Would need more than one for large space. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: joy grant

customer_reviews.title: Love the lighting feature but sound isn't as good as others
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound is not that good but I enjoy the lighting feature as I wanted something for evenings on the patio that wasn't so bright and more mood setting. Like app and how music can sync up with lighting. Wish it sounded better tho!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara brown

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I absolutely love these.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one for a main bathroom, and one for my daughters bedroom. We love them. They are bright, and the color changing is fun. The speaker has great sound with good bass. Works great with her iPhone, and my Android device.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Richter

customer_reviews.title: Very low volume
customer_reviews.text: My loves the is bulb but complains about the highest volume being a bit on the low side. If used the the bathroom, the shower would drown out the sound of the bulb on its and the source, highest volume setting.
customer_reviews.author: Josshe

customer_reviews.title: Add sound anywhere. Sound is ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought two away a good price. You must use the app to turn them on/ off and dim. Sound output is ok. Not super loud. If installing on a lamp the lamp shade will deflect the sound making it a little hard to hear. Easy way to have sound wherever you you have a light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: YAR

customer_reviews.title: This is Really Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this and have it in our screen room. It sounds great and the light/app feature works super! We're so happy to have it and hope to get more of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool for sure
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is being JBL speakers I expected a little more from them, having said that it’s a really neat bulb, would be perfect for a kids bedroom or a game room
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfaction 100% mybe 65%
customer_reviews.text: Only works with blue tooth. No wifi pain to set up .wont work with alexa as controlled light but speaker works with alexa by blue tooth .
customer_reviews.author: matt vandanbrook

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work on Androids
customer_reviews.text: This is a Bluetooth connected bulb, but it does not work on Android phones and I contacted the company, but there are currently no plans to fix this. I am unable to verify if it works on Apple Phones or any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. sounds good. colors are not bright but the good enough. app is annoying to all hell. 3/5 I use it 24/7 tho.........
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. A. Van Der Dijs

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: The distance between the phone & the speaker can't be far at all. It needs a little more range.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and connects quickly
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, just figured there would be better sound with jbl attached you it. It’s ok and will work fine. Just expected more I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Mckinley

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, cost effective, and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: After searching for speakers that I would have to run wires for, mount, and pay a couple hundred dollars for I decided to order one light bulb. I am very satisfied thus far with this purchase. It connects immediately, has good sound quality, and has no lag in voice to video.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz Abi

customer_reviews.title: A chonky bulb that serves multiple use cases.
customer_reviews.text: This bulb is an absolute behemoth. The light is great and the audio quality is passable for being a speaker built into a lightbulb. My only concern I would warn others about is that the size of the bulb makes it unsuitable for some fixtures. The globes of the porch lights I wanted to install the bulb in would not fit it. It's also hefty, but that's a testament to quality. Great buy if you're putting it in a lamp for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon White

customer_reviews.title: Top notch sound! 5*
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed! It says to talk about the easy of install(insert joke about how many it takes to screw in light bulb here) and brightness and warmth...let’s talk about the sound! Amazed on the sound. Don’t expect a concert, but it holds it own pretty dang well!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Sengled is great quality and sound, well worth the cost. I love love this light and will buy others soon. It has great sound and I like the simple packaging. Overall a WIN! I had previously purchased a another brand (cheaper) which, I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Links up easily. The bulb is a little heavy. It sounds like a cheap bluetooth lightbulb which is exactly what it is.
customer_reviews.author: rndsommer

product_meta.title: Sengled Solo RGBW Bluetooth Light Bulb Speaker Multi Color Changing LED Light Bulb 60W Equivalent Dimmable App Controlled E26 Smart Music Bulb, Compatible with Alexa via Bluetooth Connection
product_meta.description: Size:RGBWBuilt-in1. 58-Inch high-fidelity Bluetooth speaker, solo color plus brings premium sound experience to your home with high volume and deep bass effect. Whether it s in your bedroom, or study room, just pair with you smart devices, you can stream effortlessly your favorite music, broadcast and other audio.
feature_bullets: Unbelievable sound - The Singled A19 LED light bulb with a Hi-Fi speaker delivers pure and powerful sound. Compared with other Bluetooth speaker bulbs on the market, Solo Color plus strengthens your music's bass at all volumes without distortions.

Enjoy your colorful life - pick from over 16 Million Colors, or let the bulb choose for you. Add an extra level of fun to your next living room dance party or bedtime routine with the preset Rhythm mode that changes colors to the beat of the music.

VOICE AND APP CONTROLLABLE - Works with Alexa devices via Bluetooth for audio control (but you can't control the light). You can use the Singled Pulse app to control the light and music without worrying about losing or damaging a remote control.

Auto sleep timer - after a busy day at work, relax your mind by using Solo Color plus to help put you to sleep quickly. Set up the auto sleep timer in the app, and just enjoy the music as you fall asleep. You don't even need to turn the light off!
PLUG AND PLAY - Just twist the Solo Color Plus into an existing E26 light socket or fixture around your home, and you can enjoy your music and light via Bluetooth from your mobile device!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,032 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
